General.Name: Ningbo Tech-Bank Co Ltd
General.Description: Tech-bank Food Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the agriculture and animal husbandry businesses in China and internationally. The company operates through Feed, Breeding, Food, Animal Vaccine Division, and Engineering Division segments. It provides feed technical consulting services; manufactures and sells organic and microbial fertilizers; and sells fresh and live aquatic products. The company also engages in wholesale and retail of feed and feed raw materials; import and export of self-operated, agency goods, and technologies; steel structure, electrical, and industrial automation engineering construction; production of aquatic fry, livestock, and poultry; aquatic product and pig breeding; and planting and sale of crops. In addition, it is involved in the manufacturing, selling, installation, maintenance, and technical consultation of machinery and equipment; and research and development, manufacturing, and selling of environmental protection materials and equipment. The company was formerly known as Ningbo Tech-Bank Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tech-bank Food Co., Ltd. in May 2017. Tech-bank Food Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Nanjing, China.
General.Address: Building B, Public Innovation Platform, Nanjing, China, 211800
